Experience


I have 3 years of experience (1 year with Java and 2 years with Ruby and Python). I really love working with Ruby even with Python but not with Java. Here are some projects that I developed with YACFirm:

Kumakore

API to develop mobile games, based on REST architecture, created with Ruby and Sinatra.

I worked with a team in this project. Some of my responsibilities were:

  • Create new API calls
  • Design an efficient architecture to manage the information
  • Identify and suggest efficient solutions to technicals problems
  • Implement new tools or solutions to get better performance

I worked in this project almost for one year

SinCola

Queue management system for costumer service. Finalist on Wayra Venezuela 2011 . Built on Ruby on Rails. We developed the API and Web site.

I worked with a team in this project. Some of my responsibilities were:

  • Create new calls for the API
  • Develop new feature for the Website using the API calls
  • Solve bugs

El Morro Futsal

Web interface for renting fields to play soccer. This is a small project created with Django.

I worked alone in this project under supervision. My tasks were:

  • Design and create the models according to specifications
  • Coupling the interface template
  • Deploy on Heroku
